TopicTitle: Space Shuttle Pack for ksp 1.0.4 dev thread

Articles.Content:
Mike, are you the reincarnation of Stachanov? Man, take a rest

the enjoyment of making what I like and the appreciation from others makes it all worth while.

- - - Updated - - -

Hehe I was about to say the same thing.

It s very impressive the amount of good work you re doing Mike. One of the few threads in development I enjoy following everyday. Plus I really like the shuttle/dreamer/ISS so it s work hours very well spent in my opinion. On top of that the 747 + shuttle is very useful for me to learn as I m trying to make my first mod ( A300 with soar shuttle) Thanks for the great work!!

.

thanks yeah it is fun and tricky too sometimes.

I tend to over complicate things maybe?

feel free to learn from my work (watch out for errors) and I look forward to your project!
last remaining wheels ready for the 747

I'm proud to be working with mr Mike_NZ.. to bring you guys. SOFIA!!!!!!

Edited August 9, 2015 by Tristonwilson12
The progress you have made with this mod is incredible (no offence dragon!). Cant wait to try it out again! (been play GTA V and the witcher 3 recently (on PC of course)).
Hey mike. After i am done studying and learning how,to fly tbe two craft...i'll begin filming the first episode covering the enterprise test flights.

hey mike. After i am done studying and learning how,to fly tbe two craft...i'll begin filming the first episode covering the enterprise test flights.

ooooo

ooooo

Yeah, i'm planning a series dedicated to cbronicling ALL space shuttle missions, including enterpriise test flights.
I also did a little texturing on the gantry
sorry for my horrible texturing skills......

can you run me through your mods, mod version and ksp version please? I would like to sort this issue out

Its probably just my ....ty flying, but in case not... ksp 1.04, latest version of this mod. Mod list: http://i.imgur.com/lRIdlpt.png

I am using the RO version which is rather unfinished, so it could be a problem with that version specifically. Also with regards to the RO version, the rear RCS blocks (On the OMS pods) don't function properly

ok so I updated the gantry model (looks a bit better)

uploaded new download. (overwrite your current)

if it still spawns in the air: launch new vessel from the vab, then press ctrl+k

click on "tower" then on the new popup window, "press snap to terrain"
